Question 15 
 
A single 50 Hz synchronous generator on droop control was delivering 100 MW power to a system. Due 
to increase in load, generator power had to be increased by 10 MW, as a result of which, system frequency 
dropped to 49.75 Hz. Further increase in load in the system resulted in a frequency of 49.25 Hz. At this 
condition, the power in MW supplied by the generator is_____ (rounded off to two decimal places).

130
